key.name: plugins
key.description: Each element is a string specifying the gsettings path of the plugin's configuration.

key.name: keybindings
key.description: Dictionary of command key-bindings. Each key is the key-sequence and the corresponding value is the name of the command to execute.

key.name: name
key.description: The plugin name which is displayed to the user.

key.name: path
key.description: The path to the plugin's .so library file.

key.name: regex
key.description: A regular expression which matches the file names of the archives readable by the plugin.
